text: Giorgio Tombesi (22 March 1926 â€“ 3 January 2023) was an Italian politician. He was born in Udine. He was a member of the Christian Democracy (DC) party. From 1976 to 1983, he served in the Chamber of Deputies. Tombesi died on 3 January 2023 in Trieste. He was 96. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Politicians from Friuli-Venezia Giulia Category:People from Udine
title: Giorgio Tombesi
